title: Over 40 hospitalised due to protest in Mirihana
body_lines: A total of 41 people, including police and Special Task Force (STF) officers, who were injured during the protest in Mirihana, were admitted to the Colombo National Hospital (CNH) and Colombo South Teaching Hospital in Kalubowila.
Seventeen civilians, 14 STF personnel, 3 police officers and 3 journalists were among the injured.
Meanwhile, four patients were admitted to the Colombo South Teaching Hospital in Kalubowila.  (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
